src.visualization.charts module¶

class src.visualization.charts.ChartFactory[source]¶

Bases: object

A factory class for generating various types of Plotly charts.

static bar_chart(data: <module 'plotly.express.data' from '/Users/mathieudelarue/Desktop/TelecomParis/Kit Big Data/projet-mangetamain/.venv/lib/python3.11/site-packages/plotly/express/data/__init__.py'>, x_col: str, y_col: str, color_col: str, text_col: str, title: str = 'Macronutrient Proportions') → Figure[source]¶

Generate a stacked bar chart for macronutrient data.

Parameters:¶

datapx.data

Data source for the chart.

x_colstr

Column name for the x-axis.

y_colstr

Column name for the y-axis.

color_colstr

Column name for coloring the bars.

text_colstr

Column name for displaying text on bars.

titlestr, optional

Title of the chart (default is “Macronutrient Proportions”).

Returns:¶

go.Figure

A Plotly bar chart figure.

Labels for the pie chart (e.g., “Fat”, “Protein”).

titlestr, optional

Title of the chart (default is “Nutritional Breakdown”).

Returns:¶

go.Figure

A Plotly pie chart figure.

[calories, fat, sugars, sodium, protein, saturated fat, carbs].
